name: Summe Gun Laude
description:
Summe Gun Laude is a Action game in which you play as a character that has to fight their teachers and fellow students to gain study points to pass high school, Currently in development so a thrilling narrative and beautiful character designs are soon to come as well as larger levels and vibrant and ever adapting attack styles.

EULA: https://www.termsfeed.com/live/5c1bb28f-cd7f-4004-8d69-8049ea63ab10

Developer / Artist: https://itch.io/profile/renegami

Level Designer/Artist: https://divinemadnezzz.itch.io/
